html.p: A matrix is in Row-Reduced Echelon Form (RREF) if it satisfies the following conditions:

li.p: All rows of all zeros are at the bottom.
If a row is non-zero, its first non-zero entry is 1. (This is called a pivot.)
Each pivot is the only non-zero entry in its column.
A pivot in a lower row is to the right of any pivot in a higher row.
